description.narrative: 1.1.: Number of young people aged 11-20 years reached with life skills-based HIV education in secondary schools setting. 1.2.: Number of young people 11-24 out-of-school reached by HIV/AIDS education in out-of-school settings 1.3.: Number of MSM reached with a defined package of HIV prevention services 1.4.: Number of FSW contacts reached with HIV/AIDS prevention programme 2.1.: Number of adults and children living with HIV who receive care and support services outside health facilities during the reporting period. 2.2.: Number of orphans and vulnerable children 0-17 years whose households received free basic external support in caring for the child (cash transfer) 5.5: Number of HIV testing and counseling services provided (including pre and post- test counseling)

title.narrative: Strengthening National Systems for UNCAC Implementation

description.narrative: This Project aims to strengthen national structures to implement the UNCAC in Country. The Government of Belize will accede to the UNCAC in December 2016 and will then begin the implementation process.
